resources.string: Needs permission. Please enable it in Settings.
The electric field sensors are in this position.
If you search underwater make sure your phone has a waterproof device.
Connect to a WIFI network, Open the App and Navigate to WIFI Scan.
Turn on bluetooth on your device
Turn off all the lights in the room and proceed to the next step.
Turn off all the lights in the room and proceed to the next step.
Tap “Scan” button and wait for results. The app will begin scanning for all nearby WIFI devices.
Tap “Scan” button and wait for results. The app will begin scanning for all nearby Bluetooth devices.
Grant camera access, then turn on the camera and select color
Grant camera access, then turn on the camera
Tap “Start Detect” button and bring your device to the place you want to scan. The app will begin scanning for all nearby Magnetic object.
Tap “View Device” and check the list of suspicious devices.
Point the camera or bring your phone close to suspicious locations with hidden cameras.
Point the camera or bring your phone close to suspicious locations with hidden cameras.
Turn on Camera, Vibration, Flash or Sound for easier detection
Review Detected Devices: The app will list all devices connected to the network. Look for any unfamiliar or suspicious devices that might be hidden cameras.
If there is a red light, it is likely a hidden camera device.
If there is a red circle, it is likely a hidden camera device.
